sentence.Network_en: The directors call the shots and nothing happens without their say-so.
sentence.Network_cn: 董事们掌握大权，没有他们的允许什么都不能做。

sentence.Network_en: It doesn't sound exactly orthodox, if I may say so.
sentence.Network_cn: 恕我直言，那听起来不太符合常规。

sentence.Network_en: Directors call the shots and nothing happens on set without their say-so.
sentence.Network_cn: 导演发号施令，拍摄现场的一切都必须得到他们的许可。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 耶稣共有 78 笔相关歌词。 ... 6.永远掌权 forever Reign 4.都说 say So 10.我心所求( my Heart Longs For).
UNIT 3. Why Do We Believe That the Earth... ... foretell 预言 say-so 权威性声明；无证据的断言 predict 预言.

list.abs: she often used to say so ., 她过去总是这么说.
no matter who may say so , it is not true ., 不管谁这样说都不是真的.

entry.def: If you do something on someone's say-so, they tell you to do it or they give you permission to do it.

example.ex: Directors call the shots and nothing happens on set without their say-so.
example.tran: 导演发号施令，拍摄现场的一切都必须得到他们的许可。

means.word_mean: 3. the power or right to give orders or make decisions;

sentences.sentence: "he has the authority to issue warrants"
"deputies are given authorization to make arrests"

auth_sentence.content: Hacked Off knows that but does not say so.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hacked Off knows that but does not say so.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hacked Off knows that but does not say so.

auth_sentence.content: It was fantastic, though I say so myself.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was fantastic, though I say so myself.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was fantastic, though I say so myself.

auth_sentence.content: We wish Republicans like Paul Ryan would say so.
auth_sentence.res_content: We wish Republicans like Paul Ryan would say so.
